finaliseOrder(Connection, Scanner) - Static method in class QuickFoodMS
A method to update the status of an order to "finalised" when the order has been completed and paid for.
findAndDisplayOrder(Connection, Scanner) - Static method in class QuickFoodMS
This method locates and display the order information based on user input.
findCustomerId(Connection, String, String) - Static method in class Customer
A method to find the customer's ID from the first name and surname entered by the user.
findCustomerName(Connection, int) - Static method in class Customer
A method to find the customer full name from the unique customer id.
findDriverId(Connection, Scanner) - Static method in class Driver
A method to find the driver unique id from the driver's full name.
findDriverName(Connection, int) - Static method in class Driver
This method finds a driver name from the input of a driver id.
findExistingOrderNumber(Connection, Scanner) - Static method in class Order
A method that searches for the order number using the customer's first and surname as well as the restaurant's name to try and eliminate duplicates as far as possible.
findItemName(Connection, int) - Static method in class Item
A method to find an items name from its unique item id.
findItemPrice(Connection, int) - Static method in class Item
A method to find an item's price from its unique item id.
findOrdersAllocatedToDriver(Connection, int) - Static method in class Driver
This method covers the functionality of finding all orders that is allocated to a specific user.
findPendingOrders(Connection) - Static method in class Order
A method that finds pending orders by searching through the boolean column finalised in the orders table and returns a list of records that have false values.
findRestaurantId(Connection, String) - Static method in class Restaurant
A method to find the restaurant's ID from the first name of the restaurant entered by the user.
findRestaurantLocation(Connection, String) - Static method in class Restaurant
This method finds the restaurant location from the restaurant name.
findRestaurantName(Connection, int) - Static method in class Restaurant
This method finds the restaurant name from the restaurant id entered by the user.
findRestaurantPhoneNumber(Connection, int) - Static method in class Restaurant
A method to find the restaurant's phone number from its unique id number.
